shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: This order can't be shipped to your location. Please ensure that your destination is not a PO Box or a US Military shipping address. If your order contains liqueur, please ensure that you are shipping to AR, AZ, CA, CO, DE, FL, HI, IL, IA, KY, LA, MD, MN, MO, NC, NE, NH, NV, NJ, NY, OR, TX, VA, WA, or WV.
shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: This order can't be shipped to your location. Please ensure that your destination is not a PO Box or a US Military shipping address. If your order contains liqueur, please ensure that you are shipping to AR, AZ, CA, CO, DE, FL, HI, IL, IA, KY, LA, MD, MN, MO, NC, NE, NH, NV, NJ, NY, OR, TX, VA, WA, or WV.

shipping.no_rates_for_country_notice: We are not able to ship this order.

thank_you.order_status_confirmed_order_with_email: You will receive a confirmation email. If you have any questions about your order, please contact us. Enjoy your treats...They're on the way!
thank_you.order_status_confirmed_order_with_phone: You will receive a text. If you have any questions about your order, please contact us. Enjoy your treats...They're on the way!
thank_you.order_status_confirmed_order_with_email_: You will receive a confirmation email. If you have any questions about your order, please contact us. Enjoy your treats...They're on the way!
thank_you.page_title: Thank You For Ordering From Ethel M Chocolates!

custom_delivery_date.explanation_html: Don’t want your order to ship immediately? Request a Specific Delivery Date outside our regular Standard and Rush delivery timeframes below. We will do our best to have FedEx deliver it on this date, but we cannot guarantee it. If you want your order as quickly as possible, skip this and choose a shipping option at checkout.
custom_delivery_date.express_shipping_html: Note: When you select a Specific Delivery Date, you will no longer be able to select Rush Shipping at Checkout. Deselect your Delivery Date if you wish to receive it sooner.
